meanings.definition: A set of electronic components in a computer that manages data flow between the processor, memory, and peripherals.
meanings.sent1: The chipsets in my computer help the processor communicate with the memory.
meanings.sent2: Modern computers rely on efficient chipsets to ensure smooth data transfer.
meanings.sent3: I asked the chipsets in my computer to have a meeting to discuss data traffic.
meanings.sent4: The chipsets worked together like a well-oiled machine, ensuring data flow was seamless.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the chipsets resembled a complex puzzle, fitting perfectly in the computer system.

meanings.definition: A group of integrated circuits designed to work together as a unit in a computer system.
meanings.sent1: The chipsets in the computer were carefully selected to optimize performance.
meanings.sent2: The technician installed the new chipsets to enhance the computer's capabilities.
meanings.sent3: The chipsets in the computer threw a party to celebrate their successful collaboration.
meanings.sent4: The chipsets functioned harmoniously, like a symphony orchestra playing in perfect unison.
meanings.sent5: The chipsets hummed with activity, synchronizing the computer's operations flawlessly.
